title: Trump approves U.S. Steel and Nippon Steel mega-merger
shortDescription: The agreement brings the companies one step closer to completing the $14.3 billion sale of U.S. Steel that the companies agreed to in December 2023.

title: Where to watch Trump's birthday military parade on TV and livestream
shortDescription: The day-long festival will take place in Washington, D.C. on June 14, with music performances, fireworks and a grand procession. Here's how to watch.

title: President Trump is on a pardon spree | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Trump’s spate of controversial pardons hint at a two-tiered system of justice where only allies get clemency.

title: Judge sides with Trump DOJ to keep Mahmoud Khalil in detention
shortDescription: His lawyers have fought for his release to be with his wife and newborn son, who sought his return by Father's Day, on June 15.

title: President Trump is on a pardon spree
shortDescription: Trump’s spate of controversial pardons hint at a two-tiered system of justice where only allies get clemency.

title: 3 nationwide Trump protests in 3 months: Is there an uptick?
shortDescription: 'No Kings' protested are planned across the country for June 14, Trump's birthday and the planned day for the Amy parade. Is it an uptick in protests?

title: Trump administration grants air pollution exemptions to 66 coal-fired power plants
shortDescription: The Trump administration has granted two-year exemptions to 66 coal-fired power plants from federal emissions rules targeting air pollutants.

title: How much will Trump's military parade and festival cost?
shortDescription: Dozens of tanks, thousands of soldiers, parachute jumpers, artillery, Blackhawks and vintage warplanes: What will all that cost?

title: Senate keeps provision for curbing court orders in Trump bill
shortDescription: The Senate kept a controversial provision that experts say threatens the enforcement of court orders in package of Trump's legislative priorities.

title: 'No Kings Day' protests against Trump parade
shortDescription: In all 50 states, grassroots groups are organizing "No Kings Day" rallies to oppose Donald Trump’s military parade, set to take place on his birthday.

title: Why isn't there a 'No Kings Day' Trump protest in DC?
shortDescription: Around 1,800 protests are set to coincide with President Trump's military parade in Washington, D.C. yet none planned in the U.S. capital. Here's why.

title: Will new mom Tiffany Trump intro baby Boulos at Army birthday celebration
shortDescription: Tiffany Trump and Michael Boulos welcomed a baby boy, Alexander Trump Boulos, at 4:44 am May 15, 2025. Grandpa Donald Trump turns 79 on June 14, 2025.

title: Map: See route of Trump's June 14 military parade
shortDescription: The U.S. Army is marking its 250th anniversary with a dramatic procession through the streets of the nation’s capital Saturday, June 14. Here's where.

title: US judge blocks Trump administration from overhauling federal elections
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge Denise Casper in Boston issued a preliminary injunction at the behest of 19 Democratic-led states.
